Description: 2017 Ibanez RGIT20FE Iron Label Transparent Gray Flat Electric Guitar #170808117 Up for sale a 2017 Ibanez RGIT20FE Iron Label Transparent Gray Flat Electric Guitar - #170808117!  We are an Authorized Dealer of Ibanez Guitars!  This instrument is a Used Model in Excellent Cosmetic Condition and in Perfect Playing Condition.  On this one, there is a tiny notch/paint chip on the headstock (see 24th picture) and there are few scratches, marks, tiny dents, barely few tiny notches, a light finish deterioration and few other signs of wear here and there (see 12th to 24th pictures), but really nothing major.  Unit does not come with any case. - All pictures are in the "Item Description" section of the listing - IBANEZ RGIT20FE IRON LABEL The RGIT20FE is an RG series solid body electric guitar model released in mid-2014. It was made in Indonesia as part of the metal-focused Iron Label line. The RGIT20FE features graphite reinforced neck-thru construction with ash body wings and a 24-fret ebony fingerboard with no inlays. Components include a fixed bridge, dual active EMG humbucking pickups, a kill switch and Gotoh locking tuning machines. The RGIT20FE was discontinued after 2017.es slick style and a unique sound that's perfectly at home in modern music. SPECIFICATIONS: Model name : RGIT20FE Year(s) produced : 2015–2017 Made in : Indonesia Finish : Transparent Gray Flat (TGF) 2016–2017 Body type : Solid body Body material : Ash wings Neck joint : Neck-thru Bridge : Gibraltar Standard II fixed Hardware color : Cosmo black Neck type : Nitro Wizard Neck material : 7-piece maple/ walnut w/ graphite rods Scale length : 648mm / 25½" Fingerboard material : Ebony Fingerboard inlays : None Frets : 24 / jumbo Machine heads : Gotoh SG381 MG-T locking Pickup configuration : HH Bridge pickup : EMG 81 (H) active/ ceramic Neck pickup : EMG 60 (H) active/ ceramic Controls : Master volume / 3-way toggle / kill switch Weight : 7.2 lbs / 3.3 kg All our items are fully verified by our pro technician and/or adjusted by our pro luthier before being very carefully packed by our pro service team here at the shop prior to shipment, buy with confidence! --------------------------------------------------------------------- Canadian customers must pay any applicable sales taxes.
